name: Excellent Game
description:
excellent game

goal: collect egg

i have built this in the period between 2014 and 2017 but it's unfinished and I won't be continuing. expect dead ends and half baked ideas :( however there is still a bunch to explore :)

feel free to treat this more like a virtual art museum than a game and fly though locked doors. you won't be able to see everything by playing normally.

-

important hints

  • press V to toggle flying (C to fly downwards) you can fly though walls and locked doors
  • there are not enough eggs for all doors, just fly though them
  • teleporting from respawn chambers does not work, blame Unity for changing 3d ui behaviour in an update
  • do not press P. you will have to restart the game if you do

good lcuks

WARNING: skeletons
